plot: Cornigliano, Genova, Italia. Today. Salvatore and Christian Costarelli, marble-cutters. After eight hours of work they go to the gym to train very hardly, to make the boxing. Why do they do it? What do they dream?
title: Ring! Una storia di boxe
plot_es: Cornigliano, Genova, Italia. Today. Salvatore and Christian Costarelli, marble-cutters. After eight hours of work they go to the gym to train very hardly, to make the boxing. Why do they do it? What do they dream?
plot_en: Cornigliano, Genova, Italia. Today. Salvatore and Christian Costarelli, marble-cutters. After eight hours of work they go to the gym to train very hardly, to make the boxing. Why do they do it? What do they dream?
